name: Python function with extra whitespace
description: LLM adds extra spaces around operators when trying to fix a function
original:
def calculate_total(price, tax_rate):
    return price * (1 + tax_rate)

llm_edit.new_text:
def calculate_total(price, tax_rate, discount=0.0):
    return price*(1+tax_rate)*(1-discount)

expected:
def calculate_total(price, tax_rate, discount=0.0):
    return price * (1 + tax_rate) * (1 - discount)

metadata.failure_reason: LLM removed spaces around operators in search pattern
